node.hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
node.detail_zh: 患者同屬早前染病的「打邊爐家族」，該名 52 歲男患者是 2 月 9 日確診的 51 歲女患者（第 #35 宗個案患者）的丈夫，25 歲女患者（第 #34 宗個案患者）和 22 歲男患者（第 #32 宗個案患者）的父親，同居住在禮頓道 42 - 56 號禮智大廈。他在 2 月 8 日開始咳嗽、喉嚨痛和口乾， 2 月 9 日入住東區尤德夫人那打素醫院， 2 月 10 日傍晚確診。
node.detail_en: The patient is linked to the cluster of cases arising from a family gathering in Kwun Tong. The male patient is the husband of patient no. 35 and the father of patients no. 34 and no. 32 who were diagnosed on Feb 9. They live at Lai Chi Building, 42-56 Leighton Road. The patient started coughing and having a sore throat on Feb 8. He was admitted to Pamela Youde Nethersole Eastern Hospital on Feb 9 and diagnosed with coronavirus on Feb 10.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 「打邊爐家族」疑因為在 2020 年 1 月 26 日（農曆年初二）於觀塘一 party room 舉行家族聚會，包括在室外平台燒烤及打邊爐，聚會共有 19 人出席，包括 2 名來自中國廣東省的親戚。
groups.description_en: The "hotpot family" cluster is a group of 19 family members who joined a family gathering at a party room in Kwun Tong on Jan 26, 2020 (2nd day of Chinese New Year), where they had BBQ and hotpot. 2 of the participants had travelled from Guangdong.

node.location_zh: 禮頓道 42-56 號禮智大廈
node.remarks_zh: 2 月 8 日出現咳嗽、喉嚨痛及口乾
node.remarks_en: Developed cough, sore throat and dry mouth on Feb 8

node.location_zh: 陶源酒家灣仔菲林明道分店
永興工業大廈 Lento Party Room
node.location_en: Lento Party Room, Wing Hing Industrial Building
